explains: n. 犹太教；犹太主义；（总称）犹太人
wordGroup: orthodox judaism 正统派犹太教

sentences.en: He lapsed from Judaism when he was a student.
sentences.cn: 他当学生时就放弃了犹太教。

sentences.en: He was brought up in a family that practised traditional Judaism.
sentences.cn: 他在一个信奉传统犹太教的家庭里长大。

sentences.en: They carried with them the idea and the traditions that laid the foundation for the major religions of the western world: Judaism, Christianity and Islam.
sentences.cn: 他们传承下来的的思想和传统为西方世界的主要宗教——犹太教、基督教和伊斯兰教——奠定了基础。
